nodes.text: The Elrood Sector Fleet was an Imperial Sector Fleet, assigned to the defense of Elrood sector during the Galactic Civil War, commanded by Moff Villis Andal. It consisted of the Imperial-class Star Destroyers Stalker and Thunderflare, the Bayonet-class light cruiser Rintonne's Flame, and smaller ships: 12 system patrol craft, customs vessels, Skipray Blastboats, and TIE Series starfighters. The Brazen was later assigned to the sector fleet but it was destroyed in 1 ABY.
